org.openimaj.image.pixel

Class Pixel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Readable, ReadableASCII, ReadableBinary, ReadWriteable, Writeable, WriteableASCII, WriteableBinary, Coordinate, Point2d
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ValuePixel

    public class Pixel
extends Object
implements Point2d, Cloneable
    Represents a pixel within an image, storing its coordinates. Provides helper methods for rounding non-integer values to pixel coordinates.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Field Summary
